item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 11, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. ESP32 Undocumented Bluetooth Commands: Clearing the Air (164 points | 58 comments)

3. A Supersolid Made Using Photons (80 points | 25 comments)

5. Bending Spacetime in the Basement (1997) (164 points | 25 comments)
6. Sidekick: Local-first native macOS LLM app (32 points | 1 comment)
7. Bel in Clojure (2022) (57 points | 2 comments)
8. Neonatal fungi: lifelong metabolic health via macrophage β cell development (25 points | 3 comments)
9. Asking LLMs to create my game Shepard's Dog (124 points | 37 comments)
10. Software-Defined Radio for Engineers (2018) [pdf] (261 points | 57 comments)
11. Kissing moons may explain why Earth's moon is so large (13 points | 4 comments)
12. Mathematical Foundations of Reinforcement Learning (319 points | 29 comments)
13. Local Deep Research – ArXiv, wiki and other searches included (11 points | 5 comments)
14. Canon EF and RF Lenses – All Autofocus Motors (455 points | 111 comments)

20. Firmware update bricks HP printers, makes them unable to use HP cartridges (198 points | 167 comments)
21. Show HN: In-Browser Graph RAG with Kuzu-WASM and WebLLM (129 points | 27 comments)
22. Shef (74 points | 32 comments)

24. How to Implement a Cosine Similarity Function in TypeScript (75 points | 32 comments)
25. Zero-Downtime Kubernetes Deployments on AWS with EKS (157 points | 89 comments)
26. A technical history of Acorn Computers (108 points | 46 comments)
27. Music labels will regret coming for the Internet Archive, sound historian says (416 points | 140 comments)
28. STEPS Toward the Reinvention of Programming (2012) [pdf] (80 points | 49 comments)
29. Arranging invisible icons in quadratic time (2021) (37 points | 14 comments)
30. New Zealand's $16B health dept managed finances with single Excel spreadsheet (60 points | 49 comments)
